casebody.data:
In re C.T. & B.T. No. 175A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2007. Elizabeth Gurnee, Fayetteville, for Cumberland County DSS. Beth Hall, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of April 2007 by Respondent (Father) to Amend Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of April 2007."
